Uses of Mention in reck.annotation
 

Classes in reck.annotation that implement Mention
 class MentionImpl
          A MentionImpl object acts as an Entity Mention that contains type/subtype/class, a set of entity mentions/ attributes corresponding to ACE 2004 definition.
 

Fields in reck.annotation declared as Mention
protected static Mention[] EntityImpl.ZEROMENTIONS
          A leaf node should have a zero-length array for its children.
